archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.2.6a: a) identify the need for further investigation of the supplier's information security capability (e.g. as a result of inadequate information provided or security vulnerabilities identified)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
